sentences.en: In an awkward press conference, Mr King parried questions on the allegations.
sentences.cn: 在一场尴尬的新闻发布会上，金先生回避了有关指控的问题。

sentences.en: It is my destiny one day to be king.
sentences.cn: 我命中注定有一天要成为国王。

sentences.en: Mr King seems certain to be pressed for further details.
sentences.cn: 看来人们一定会竭力要求金先生提供进一步的细节。

sentences.en: On 2 December Henry VI was crowned king (= made the king at an official ceremony ).
Some of the clergy refused to acknowledge the new king'slegitimacy.
sentences.cn: 一部分神职人员拒绝承认新国王的合法地位。

sentences.en: The king could not enact laws without the sanction of Parliament.
sentences.cn: 未经议会批准，国王不能制定法律。

sentences.en: The King had brought his own bodyguard of twenty armed men.
sentences.cn: 国王带了20名持枪的贴身侍卫。

sentences.en: The King has merely given the politicians enough rope to hang themselves.
sentences.cn: 国王只不过是给了这些政客自缚的绳子。

sentences.en: The King made major concessions to end the confrontation with his people.
sentences.cn: 为了结束与其臣民的冲突，国王作出了很大的让步。

sentences.en: The king said there was now a window of opportunity for peace.
sentences.cn: 国王说现在有寻求和平的短暂机会。

sentences.en: The King was unjustly accused of practising the black arts.
The king's indulgence towards his sons angered the business community.
sentences.cn: 国王对儿子们的纵容令商界恼火。

sentences.en: The King's stand is bound to reawaken the painful debate about abortion.
sentences.cn: 国王的立场必然会再次引发关于堕胎的令人头痛的辩论。

sentences.en: The last French king was Louis Philippe, who abdicated in 1848.
sentences.cn: 法国末代国王是1848年逊位的路易·菲力普。

sentences.en: The prime example is Macy's, once the undisputed king of California retailers.
sentences.cn: 最典型的例子是梅西百货，它曾经是加利福尼亚无可争辩的零售巨头。

sentences.en: The story of King Arthur became part of oral tradition.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟王的故事成为口头传说的一部分。
